Articles.Content:
Well... Today I had my last AS-level exam. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

To celebrate I decided to attempt my first ever RV. I got it first try. I did it with stock and I am very proud of it. 8)

I am now officially ready for docking.

Pics coming soon if anyone is interested. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

\*EDIT\* Ta da!

> 
> ![6IBxV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6IBxV.jpg)
> 
> ![dIwzY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/dIwzY.jpg)
> 
>

Congratulations, but shouldn\'t this be in General Discussion?

But like I could ever do a RV :\'(

> 
> Congratulations, but shouldn\'t this be in General Discussion?
> 
> But like I could ever do a RV :\'(

I figured it was slightly off-topic.

The best thing was I was expecting days of adjustments but from launch one it took about two days total. Have you tried doing an RV? \'Cause with a set-up like this it was scarily easy. I don\'t think I could teach my plan (though I\'ll have a shot and bore my friends) because I just, kinda, went for it...
I understand how to do it, I would just screw up in the middle of it, due to freaking out.

> 
> I understand how to do it, I would just screw up in the middle of it, due to freaking out.

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Yes, RCS... Lots of spare RCS... ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Congratz, what\'s awesome is that SpaceX also completed their first RV today with the ISS ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Congratz, what\'s awesome is that SpaceX also completed their first RV today with the ISS ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Ha! Coincidence? I think not. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
